com.github.sviperll.text

Interface Layoutable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - marks given renderable with it's format
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Layout

    public interface Layoutable<T>
    Can be used as layout.

    Layoutable&lt;Html&gt; is supposed to generate html output.

    Author:
    Victor Nazarov
